verses.verse: To every thing there is a season <WH2165>, and a time <WH6256> to every purpose <WH2656> under the heaven <WH8064>:

A time <WH6256> to be born <WH3205> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to die <WH4191> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> to plant <WH5193> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to pluck up <WH6131> <WH8800> that which is planted <WH5193> <WH8803>;
A time <WH6256> to kill <WH2026> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to heal <WH7495> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> to break down <WH6555> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to build up <WH1129> <WH8800>;
A time <WH6256> to weep <WH1058> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to laugh <WH7832> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> to mourn <WH5594> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to dance <WH7540> <WH8800>;

A time <WH6256> to cast away <WH7993> <WH8687> stones <WH68>, and a time <WH6256> to gather <WH3664> stones <WH68> together <WH3664> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> to embrace <WH2263> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to refrain <WH7368> <WH8800> from embracing <WH2263> <WH8763>;
A time <WH6256> to get <WH1245> <WH8763>, and a time <WH6256> to lose <WH6> <WH8763>; a time <WH6256> to keep <WH8104> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to cast away <WH7993> <WH8687>;
A time <WH6256> to rend <WH7167> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to sew <WH8609> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> to keep silence <WH2814> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to speak <WH1696> <WH8763>;
A time <WH6256> to love <WH157> <WH8800>, and a time <WH6256> to hate <WH8130> <WH8800>; a time <WH6256> of war <WH4421>, and a time <WH6256> of peace <WH7965>.
What profit <WH3504> hath he that worketh <WH6213> <WH8802> in that wherein <WH834> he laboureth <WH6001> ?
I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> the travail <WH6045>, which 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> to be exercised <WH6031> <WH8800> in it.

He hath made <WH6213> <WH8804> every thing beautiful <WH3303> in his time <WH6256>: also he hath set <WH5414> <WH8804> the world <WH5769> in their heart <WH3820>, so that <WH1097> no man <WH120> can find out <WH4672> <WH8799> the work <WH4639> that 'Elohim <WH430> maketh <WH6213> <WH8804> from the beginning <WH7218> to the end <WH5490>.
I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that there is no good <WH2896> in them, but for a man to rejoice <WH8055> <WH8800>, and to do <WH6213> <WH8800> good <WH2896> in his life <WH2416>.

And also that every man <WH120> should eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8804>, and enjoy <WH7200> <WH8804> the good <WH2896> of all his labour <WH5999>, it is the gift <WH4991> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that, whatsoever 'Elohim <WH430> doeth <WH6213> <WH8799>, it shall be for ever <WH5769>: nothing <WH369> can be put <WH3254> <WH8687> to it, nor any thing taken <WH1639> <WH8800> from it: and 'Elohim <WH430> doeth <WH6213> <WH8804> it, that men should fear <WH3372> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him.
That which hath been is now <WH3528>; and that which is to be hath already <WH3528> been; and 'Elohim <WH430> requireth <WH1245> <WH8762> that which is past <WH7291> <WH8737>.

And moreover I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> under the sun <WH8121> the place <WH4725> of judgment <WH4941>, that wickedness <WH7562> was there; and the place <WH4725> of righteousness <WH6664>, that iniquity <WH7562> was there.

I said <WH559> <WH8804> in mine heart <WH3820>, 'Elohim <WH430> shall judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>: for there is a time <WH6256> there for every purpose <WH2656> and for every work <WH4639>.

I said <WH559> <WH8804> in mine heart <WH3820> concerning the estate <WH1700> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>, that 'Elohim <WH430> might manifest <WH1305> <WH8800> them, and that they might see <WH7200> <WH8800> that they <WH1992> themselves are beasts <WH929>.

For that which befalleth <WH4745> the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> befalleth <WH4745> beasts <WH929>; even one thing <WH259> befalleth <WH4745> them: as the one dieth <WH4194>, so dieth <WH4194> the other <WH2088>; yea, they have all one <WH259> breath <WH7307>; so that a man <WH120> hath no preeminence <WH4195> above a beast <WH929>: for all is vanity <WH1892>.
All go <WH1980> <WH8802> unto one <WH259> place <WH4725>; all are of the dust <WH6083>, and all turn <WH7725> to dust <WH6083> again <WH7725> <WH8804>.

Who knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> the spirit <WH7307> of man <WH1121> <WH120> that goeth <WH5927> <WH8802> upward <WH4605>, and the spirit <WH7307> of the beast <WH929> that goeth <WH3381> <WH8802> downward <WH4295> to the earth <WH776> ?

Wherefore I perceive <WH7200> <WH8804> that there is nothing better <WH2896>, than that a man <WH120> should rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> in his own works <WH4639>; for that is his portion <WH2506>: for who shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> him to see <WH7200> <WH8800> what shall be after <WH310> him?
